testcase.classname: F01_Register | user could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter "automation" and "tester"....................................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email field..................................................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "test@test.com" and "P@ssw0rd".........................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user couldnt login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "amr@example.com" and "Passw0rd".......................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: user could select euro currency
testcase.system-out: When user select euro option................................................passed Then euro symbol is displayed on all products...............................passed

testcase.classname: F06_homeSlideres | Check if the sliders are working
testcase.name: first slider is clickable on home page
testcase.failure:
When clicking on the first slider...........................................passed Then check if u are rotated to nokia page...................................failed
